mav_sim.unit_tests.ch4_additional_tests module¶

This module provides some additional tests for chapter 4 that can be used to help you debug if you are not passing the unit tests

mav_sim.unit_tests.ch4_additional_tests.longitudinal_aerodynamics_helper() → None¶

This functions seemingly does nothing. However, if you run it in debug mode, you should be able to check the function for intermediary values. You should get the following values:

CL = 0.7410005607025906 CD = 3.7260788511899077 F_lift = 0.07385052440528686 F_drag = 0.27076556225480797 f_lon = [[0.12533388054772146], [0.], [0.25111612462155364] ] torque_lon = [ [0.], [0.0657766245422738], [0.]]

mav_sim.unit_tests.ch4_additional_tests.motor_thrust_torque_helper() → None¶

This function seemingly does nothing. However, if you run it in debug mode, you should be able to check the function for intermediary values. You should get the following values:

a = 5.683924001284114e-06 b = 0.10408774785819767 c = -32.06670169995605 omega_p = 303.05838902739146 thrust_prop = 7.081339420286007 torque_prop = 0.3525206069786054
